1: <pb/><t>Ay in camc'ulal yin Jehová yujtol max yab in tewilal.</t>
2: <t>Yuj max yab tzet max in k'an bay, xan ok wal in ba bay Cham yak'ban iquis in ec'ok.</t>
3: <t>Max in yaaytok camich yul is yal. Max jay yailal camich win. Yelxac'al tol max xiwcan aj in c'ul yuj bilc'ulal.</t>
4: <t>Catatu' max walon in ba bay Jehová. Max in tewi bay yet chi yak' jay in c'ul.</t>
5: <pb/><t>A Jehová, tojol toni, cax ay yabenc'ulal jin. A co Diosal, yelxac'al tol watx' is c'ul.</t>
6: <t>A chi taynen eb yaynakil. A yet mayal el wip max in is col Cham.</t>
7: <t>Axa tinani', ayxa in junc'ulal chi wabej yujtol a Jehová watx' max yut c'ul win.</t>
8: <t>Maj in is cha' cam Cham, max in is col bay ok'ilal, cax maj in is cha' ayc'ayok.</t>
9: <t>Yak'ban iquis intoc'al, oktoc'al wikej bay Cham.</t>
10: <pb/><t>Maxc'al waoc Jehová yipok in c'ul, caxc'al nan xol in miman yailal, max waloni: Caw wal ayc'al tzet chin oni, quin chi.</t>
11: <t>Manxa animaok ay in c'ul, xan max wala' tol masanil anima lek'ti' ton eb.</t>
12: <pb/><t>¿Tzet ok wut in paktzen masanil is watx'c'ulal Jehová max yak' ayin?</t>
13: <t>Ok witek vino yin ofrendail bay Cham, yuj walon yuj diosalil bay, yujtol max in is colo'.</t>
14: <t>A bay satak masanil is conob ok wikej walben bay Cham.</t>
15: <pb/><t>Miman yayji oc yul sat Jehová yet chi cam junok tol yet-xa Cham.</t>
16: <t>Mamin Jehová, ayin ton a chekbej in. Ach max in a colcan elok, xan bekan inxa.</t>
17: <pb/><t>Ok in paktzej yin wak'on xajanbal yuj aloj yuj diosal ayach, cax ok ach wak'on binajok.</t>
18: <t>Mamin Jehová, ok wak' yun walben ayach satak masanil a conob,</t>
19: <t>bay yamak'il a templo nan xol conob Jerusalén. <pb/>¡Al-layokab watx' k'anej ayach!</t>
